title: Da Zui Tu Shuo Gushi
synopsis: The animation series selected 48 idiom stories and historical allusions as the basis of the film's conception. The life experience of a group of small animals represented by "big-mouthed rabbits" adopts a humorous and exaggerated approach, using traditional story elements in the big mouth. In the rabbit story series, ancient stories and legends are intertwined with real situations, the picture is strong, vivid and interesting, easy for children to understand, arouse children's curiosity and desire to watch, and develop wisdom and expand their horizons while watching easily. And imagination, enrich historical and cultural knowledge. (translated from tenceng)
